title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 503.6 - Incorporation by reference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 503.6 - Incorporation by reference

State Regulations

Any party may move to submit for the hearing record, by
reference, information contained in any official department records. Upon
request, the party shall supply copies of any material incorporated by
reference to the other parties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
503.6

Renumbered from 503.7

New

York State Register March 5, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 09, eff. 3/5/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
